text: Eghtɨ gumazir atiatia ua gɨrakɨrangɨn zuiba ko, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ataghiziba ko, gumazamizir arazir bar kurar mɨzɨrɨzibagh amiba ko, gumazir gumazibav sozi me ariaghɨriba ko, gumazamiziba uari ko akua amir araziba ko, akuzibagh amua egha imezibagh amir gumaziba ko, asebar ziaba feba ko, gumazir ifavariba, me bar uan nguibamɨn mangam. Kar danganir avim ko salfan dagɨar avir bar puvɨra isim. Kar ovever namba 2.”
